verses.verse: "Moreover you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material;] you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them with <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman.<s%>

"The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be twenty-eight <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

<S%H2568>"Five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be <S%H2266>joined<s%> to <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H259>another;<s%> and [the other] <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> [shall be] <S%H2266>joined<s%> to <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H259>another.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>outermost<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the [first] <S%H2279>set,<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> [them] on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outermost<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>set.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>set;<s%> the <S%H9234>loops<s%> shall be <S%H6901>opposite<s%> <S%H802>each<s%> <S%H259>other.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H2266>join<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> to <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> with the <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> may be a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of goats' [hair] for a <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> in all.

"The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> [shall be] <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H2266>join<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and the [other] <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and you shall <S%H3717>double<s%> <S%H3717>over<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> at the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outermost<s%> in the [first] <S%H2279>set,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> [that is outermost in] the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2279>set.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> and you shall <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps<s%> into the <S%H9234>loops<s%> and <S%H2266>join<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2266>together,<s%> that it may be a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

"And the <S%H5629>overlapping<s%> <S%H5629>part<s%> that is <S%H5736>left<s%> <S%H5736>over<s%> in the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H5736>left<s%> <S%H5736>over,<s%> shall <S%H5628>lap<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H268>back<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"And the <S%H520>cubit<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and the <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the <S%H2088>other,<s%> of what is <S%H5736>left<s%> <S%H5736>over<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> shall <S%H5628>lap<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and on the <S%H2088>other,<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it.

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red,<s%> and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>
"Then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5975>upright.<s%>

<S%H6235>"Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> [shall be] the <S%H753>length<s%> of each <S%H7175>board,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

"There [shall be] <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> <S%H7947>fitted<s%> to <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H259>another;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons;<s%>
and for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%>

and their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>
"And for the <S%H3411>rear<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> at the <S%H3411>rear.<s%>

"And they shall be <S%H8382>double<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> and <S%H9191>together<s%> they shall be <S%H8535>complete<s%> to its <S%H7218>top<s%> to the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2885>ring;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> it shall be with <S%H8147>both<s%> of them: they shall <S%H1961>form<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners.<s%>

"And there shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> with their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H134>sockets;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H3411>rear<s%> [side] to the <S%H3220>west.<s%>
"And the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> in the <S%H8432>center<s%> of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> shall <S%H1272>pass<s%> <S%H1272>through<s%> from <S%H7097>end<s%> to <S%H7097>end.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> [as] <S%H1004>holders<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars;<s%> and you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"Then you shall <S%H6965>erect<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> according to its <S%H4941>plan<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have been <S%H7200>shown<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen;<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>hang<s%> it on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> [also being of] <S%H2091>gold,<s%> on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>hang<s%> up the <S%H6532>veil<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil;<s%> and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> shall <S%H914>serve<s%> for you as a <S%H914>partition<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> of <S%H6944>holies.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> on the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> of <S%H6944>holies.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H5227>opposite<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6763>side.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H7551>weaver.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> for the <S%H4539>screen,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> [also being of] <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> for them.
